sourcesContent:
import { setCurrentTodolist } from "../../../actions/TodolistActions" const TodolistSummary = ({current_todolist, setCurrentTodolist}) => { const today = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10); return (

Summary

Total Todos: {current_todolist && current_todolist.todos.length}
Completed: {current_todolist && current_todolist.todos.length > 0 ? current_todolist.todos.filter(t => t.completed === 1).length : '0' }
Failed: {current_todolist && current_todolist.todos.length > 0 ? current_todolist.todos.filter(t => Math.round(Math.abs(new Date(today && today))) > Math.round(Math.abs(new Date(t.deadline)))).length : '0' }
) } const mapStateToProps = state =({ current_todolist: state.todolist.current_todolist }) export default connect(mapStateToProps,{setCurrentTodolist})(TodolistSummary);
